E8C795C84F2A2165D46A3D80D8E9518A: Spawns a War Bus vehicle that can emit an EMP blast.
9217BC1D49C3E47E540BC7B8223B6DA7: Spawns a driveable war bus that can be configured.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.On Player Enters: A player enters the spawned vehicle
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.On Player Exits V: A player exits the spawned vehicle
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.On Vehicle Spawns: A vehicle is spawned or respawned.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Apply OffRoad Tir: Apply off-road tires to the vehicle if the vehicle can receive them.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Tire Selection.De: Choose the type of tires for the spawned vehicle.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Boost Fuel Use.De: Controls how quickly the vehicle will use fuel while boosting.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.FuelUseMultiplier: Controls how quickly the vehicle will use fuel while driving.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Vehicle Health.De: Determines how much damage the vehicle can take before destruction.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.BoostRegenMultipl: Determines how quickly the boost meter fills.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Boost Enabled.Des: Determines if boost is enabled on vehicle
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Unlimited Boost.D: Determines if boost should consume fuel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Vehicle Indestruc: Determines if the Vehicle can be destroyed by damage.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Destroy when Stuc: Determines if the Vehicle will destroy itself when stuck underwater.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.EnableRespawn.Des: Determines if the Vehicle will respawn after being destroyed.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.FuelConsumption.D: Determines if the spawned vehicle uses fuel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Enabled During Ph: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. If set to CREATE ONLY, will only be enabled while editing your Island.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Max Random Starti: Determines the maximum random fuel percentage the vehicle will spawn with. If Max is less than or equal to Min, the vehicle will spawn with default fuel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Min Random Starti: Determines the minimum random fuel percentage the vehicle will spawn with. If Max is less than or equal to Min, the vehicle will spawn with default fuel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.bRadioEnabled.Des: Determines whether spawned vehicle is able to use the radio.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Visible During Ga: Determines whether the device is visible during the game. This does affect its collision properties.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Spawn With Cow Ca: Determines whether the vehicle has the Cow Catcher when spawned.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Disable.Descripti: Disable the Vehicle Spawner, stopping it from spawning any more vehicles.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Enable.Descriptio: Enable the Vehicle Spawner, allowing it to spawn vehicles.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Allowed Class.Des: If set to All, All Classes (including players with NO CLASS) are affected. Otherwise, the chosen Class will be used to determine the Affects Class effect. ANY CLASS - Players with a Class assigned, regardless of what Class it is. NO CLASS - Players without any assigned class.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Destroy Vehicle.D: If the vehicle that this spawner created still exists, destroy it.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.bDamageOwnVehicle: ON will allow collision to damage the player's own vehicle.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.bDamageFriendlyFi: ON will allow friendly driven vehicles to damage each other on collision.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Allow Damage From: ON will allow other vehicles to damage this vehicle by colliding with it. The other vehicles must have Damage Other Vehicles turned on.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.bDamageOtherVehic: ON will allow this vehicle to damage other vehicles by colliding with them. The other vehicles must have Allow Damage from Other Vehicles turned on.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Destroy Vehicle W: ON will destroy an already spawned vehicle when this spawner is disabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Pop All Tires.Des: Pop all of the tires on the vehicle, if the vehicle has tires to pop.
Repair all of the tires on the vehicle, if the vehicle has tires to repair.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Repair Vehicle.De: Restore the spawned vehicle to full health.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Remove Tire Modif: Revert to road tires on the vehicle if the vehicle can receive them.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Assigns Driver.De: Seats the player that instigated the message as the spawned vehicle's driver.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Random Starting F: Spawn the vehicle with a random percentage of fuel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Respawn Vehicle.D: Spawns the vehicle (Destroying the existing vehicle if it still exists).
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Activating Team.D: The Team this device belongs to.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.ExplosionDamageTo: The amount of damage to deal to environment objects when the vehicle explodes.
The amount of damage to deal to other vehicles when the vehicle explodes.
The amount of damage to deal to players when the vehicle explodes.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.LifetimeAfterExpl: The duration in seconds that the destroyed vehicle will remain in the world, after which it is removed entirely.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Max Explosion Del: The maximum time the vehicle can have zero health, after which it will explode.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Starting Fuel.Des: The percentage of fuel in the vehicle's fuel tank at spawn.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Water Destruction: When the vehicle becomes too deep in water to drive, destroy it after this delay.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Respawn Time.Desc: When the vehicle is destroyed, respawn it after this delay. (The first vehicle spawned does not use this delay.)
UserOptionDefinition.Device_WarBusSpawner_C.Respawn Vehicle W: YES will spawn a vehicle when the device is enabled. ONLY IF NEEDED will not reset an existing vehicle.
